maxram.name: Max RAM (MB)
maxram.description: Maximum amount of RAM that Minecraft will be able to use

minram.name: Min RAM (MB)
minram.description: Minimal (initial) amount of RAM that Minecraft will be able to use

screenwidth.name: Screen width
screenwidth.description: Window width when the game launches

screenheight.name: Screen height
screenheight.description: Window height when the game launches

detached.name: Detach Minecraft from launcher
detached.description: If enabled, you'll be able to close the launcher without closing Minecraft.

launcher.name: Reset launcher data
launcher.description: Pressing this button will reset all launcher settings and start onboarding.
launcher.label: Reset

assets.name: Delete all assets
assets.description:
Pressing this button will delete all game assets. They'll be redownloaded at next launch.

Use if some vanilla game textures are missing.
assets.label: Delete

instance.name: Delete modpack and game settings
instance.description:
Pressing this button will delete modpack and your settings. Modpack will be redownloaded at next launch.

Use if Minecraft doesn't start or you can't connect to the server.
instance.label: Delete

java.name: Delete Java
java.description:
Pressing this button will delete Java runtime. It'll be redownloaded at next launch.

Use if game doesn't start with some cryptic exit code.
java.label: Delete

libraries.name: Delete libraries
libraries.description:
Pressing this button will delete all game libraries. It'll be redownloaded at next launch.

Use if game doesn't start with some cryptic exit code.
libraries.label: Delete

version.name: Delete version packages
version.description:
Pressing this button will delete all game version packages. It'll be redownloaded at next launch.

Use if game doesn't start with some cryptic exit code.
version.label: Delete

everything.name: Delete ALL game files
everything.description:
Pressing this button will delete ALL game files. They'll be redownloaded at next launch.

Use only if nothing above helped.
everything.label: Delete

modpack.title: Modpack type
modpack.description: Hover over a button to see description.
modpack.onboardingextra: This choice can be changed later.

ful.title: Full install
ful.description:
Install everything without exception. Recommended type for most players.

For average/powerful PCs.

min.title: Minimal install
min.description:
Install only Minecraft, essential and optimization mods.

For weak PCs.

ess.title: Only essential
ess.description:
Only install Minecraft and a few essential mods.

Does NOT include optimization mods.

rules.title: Rules
rules.description: To play on the server, you must accept the rules. Full rule list can be found in our Telegram channel.

respect.title: Treat everyone with respect
respect.content: We do not tolerate bullying or harassment, in any way, shape or form. All members of our community should be treated with dignity and respect.

integrity.title: Play with integrity
integrity.content: Fair gameplay is core to the experience. Progression is earned through good, clean gameplay. Cheating, griefing or other threats to fair play will not be tolerated.

vigilant.title: Stay vigilant
vigilant.content: Working together we can keep the game fair and fun for all. To promote an enjoyable gameplay experience, report any incidents or inappropriate behaviors you encounter to moderation staff.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: You can send a message to developers here

unknown.title: Unknown modal
unknown.description:
Seems like something went wrong.
We already know about the problem and trying to fix it.

buttons.logs: Open last log in default editor

buttons.failedupdate:
Failed to fetch updates
Press to hide

startedoffline.title: No connection!
startedoffline.description: Seems like you don't have internet connection. Some features might not work.

gotoffline.title: No connection!
gotoffline.description: Seems like you got offline. Some features might stop working.

gotonline.title: You're online!
gotonline.description: Internet is back, all features are now working.

nolog.title: Error!
nolog.description: Unable to view latest log. There's no file.

nogamedir.title: Error!
nogamedir.description: Unable to open game directory. There's no directory.

login-error-401.title: Failed to log in!
login-error-401.description: Seems like your credentials are incorrect. Try again.

launch-error-modslocked.title: Launch error!
launch-error-modslocked.description: Failed to launch Minecraft because you changed modpack type while another game process is active. Close Minecraft and try again.

launch-error-noprofile.title: Launch error!
launch-error-noprofile.description: Failed to launch Minecraft because you didn't select a profile when logging in last time. Please, re-login in launcher settings.

launch-error-launchermeta-missing-whole.title: Launch error!
launch-error-launchermeta-missing-whole.description: Launcher metadata missing. Contact the developer.

launch-error-launchermeta-missing-versio.title: Launch error!
launch-error-launchermeta-missing-versio.description: Launcher metadata missing Minecraft or Fabric Loader version(s). Contact the developer.

update-error-nofile.title: No update file
update-error-nofile.description: Failed to find installer file in update. Please report this to developer.

confirm-stop.title: Stop Minecraft?
confirm-stop.description:
Force stopping Minecraft might cause the game to stop working correctly. Use this only if the game freezes.

To confirm, press the button again within 30 seconds.

reset-error-unknown.title: Error!
reset-error-unknown.description: An error occured while deleting files. Detailed description: {err}
